content: Hi all, I wonder if there is some matrix or table where I we can see the relation between HL7 message and FHIR resources that are generated. Could someone helps me? :)
Hi. there is a stream https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179188-v2-to.20FHIR where mapping between HL7 v2 messages and FHIR is being discussed - perhaps this helps you?
Nice! it seems to be useful. Many thanks Jose.
There is a v2 mapping table for each FHIR resource in the specs: eg http://hl7.org/fhir/patient-mappings.html#v2

yes, I know. But I think it would be useful to have a matrix/table with HL7 messages linked with FHIR resources (for example; ADT-A01 -> Encounter). Once you have an idea what resources can be created with your messages, you are able to go to the next step: The mapping you have shown, would be the next layer, in order to map segment and fields with the resource key-values.
That table is (well, a lot of them are) being built as part of the v2 to FHIR effort
